agents.duty: Find raw citation strings in text using regex patterns
agents.docstring:
Find raw citation strings in text using pattern matching.

Single duty: Identify potential legal citations in text.
Method: Regex patterns for common citation formats.
Output: List of citation candidates with positions.

agents.duty: Normalize citations to Bluebook format using templates
agents.docstring:
Normalize citations to Bluebook format using templates.

Single duty: Convert raw citations to standardized Bluebook format.
Method: Template-based transformation rules.
Output: Normalized citation strings.

agents.duty: Verify citations against case law database using SQL queries
agents.docstring:
Verify citations against case law database.

Single duty: Check if citations point to real cases.
Method: SQL queries against lawsuit_docs database.
Output: Verification status for each citation.

agents.duty: Map citation tokens to file paths/URLs in database
agents.docstring:
Map citation tokens to file paths or URLs in database.

Single duty: Find the source document for each citation.
Method: Database queries to locate case files.
Output: File paths or URLs for each citation.

agents.duty: Insert formatted citations into document text at correct positions
agents.docstring:
Insert formatted citations into document text.

Single duty: Place normalized citations at correct positions.
Method: String manipulation based on position markers.
Output: Document text with properly formatted citations.

agents.duty: Build structured section outline with headings and objectives
agents.docstring:
Build structured section outline for legal document.

Single duty: Create section headings and structure.
Method: LLM analysis of case insights to determine sections.
Output: Ordered list of sections with objectives.

agents.duty: Write a single section of legal document based on outline and context
agents.docstring:
Write a single section of legal document.

Single duty: Draft prose for one section based on outline.
Method: LLM generation from section objective and context.
Output: Written section text.

agents.duty: Write a single paragraph from a brief content prompt
agents.docstring:
Write a single paragraph within a section.

Single duty: Draft one paragraph from a brief prompt.
Method: LLM generation with strict length control.
Output: Single paragraph text.

agents.duty: Create smooth transitions between document sections
agents.docstring:
Create smooth transitions between sections.

Single duty: Write transition sentences connecting sections.
Method: LLM analysis of section boundaries.
Output: Transition sentences to insert.

agents.duty: Find relevant precedent cases using LangChain database queries
agents.docstring:
Find relevant precedent cases using LangChain for evidence retrieval.

Single duty: Identify candidate precedent cases using natural language database queries.
Method: LangChain SQLDatabaseToolkit + LLM ranking.
Output: List of relevant case citations with evidence.

agents.duty: Extract discrete facts using LangChain document retrieval
agents.docstring:
Extract discrete facts using LangChain for document retrieval.

Single duty: Extract facts as structured data using LangChain evidence retrieval.
Method: LangChain SQLDatabaseToolkit + LLM extraction.
Output: List of fact objects with source evidence.

agents.duty: Export document to Markdown format
agents.docstring:
Export document to Markdown format.

Single duty: Convert structured document to Markdown.
Method: Template-based rendering (deterministic).
Output: Markdown-formatted text.

agents.duty: Export document to DOCX format
agents.docstring:
Export document to DOCX format.

Single duty: Convert structured document to DOCX.
Method: Template-based rendering using python-docx (deterministic).
Output: DOCX file path.

agents.duty: Append structured metadata to document
agents.docstring:
Add metadata tags to document.

Single duty: Append structured metadata.
Method: JSON serialization (deterministic).
Output: Document with metadata section.

agents.duty: Extract discrete facts from documents as structured data
agents.docstring:
Extract discrete facts from documents.

Single duty: Extract facts as structured data.
Method: LLM extraction with structured output (gpt-4o-mini).
Output: List of fact objects.

agents.duty: Find relevant precedent cases from database
agents.docstring:
Find relevant precedent cases.

Single duty: Identify candidate precedent cases.
Method: DB query + mini LLM ranking.
Output: List of relevant case citations.

agents.duty: Rank precedent cases by relevance to legal issue
agents.docstring:
Rank precedent cases by relevance.

Single duty: Score and rank found precedents.
Method: LLM relevance scoring (gpt-4o-mini).
Output: Ranked list of precedents with scores.

agents.duty: Create 1-2 sentence summaries of precedent cases
agents.docstring:
Summarize precedent cases.

Single duty: Create 1-2 sentence summaries of cases.
Method: LLM summarization (gpt-4o-mini).
Output: Brief case summaries.

agents.duty: Locate full text of cited statutes from database
agents.docstring:
Find statute text from database.

Single duty: Locate full text of cited statutes.
Method: Database queries (deterministic).
Output: Statute text with metadata.

agents.duty: Retrieve exhibit documents from file system or database
agents.docstring:
Fetch exhibit files from storage.

Single duty: Retrieve exhibit documents.
Method: File system or database lookup (deterministic).
Output: Exhibit file paths or content.

agents.duty: Fix grammar and typos in text
agents.docstring:
Fix grammar and typos in text.

Single duty: Correct grammatical errors and typos.
Method: LLM-based grammar checking (gpt-4o-mini).
Output: Corrected text with change log.

agents.duty: Check document against style guide rules
agents.docstring:
Check document against style guide rules.

Single duty: Verify compliance with legal writing style guide.
Method: Rule-based checking (deterministic).
Output: List of style violations with suggestions.

agents.duty: Check argument logic and identify missing premises or gaps
agents.docstring:
Check argument logic and coherence.

Single duty: Verify logical flow and argument structure.
Method: LLM analysis of reasoning chain (gpt-4o-mini).
Output: Logic assessment with identified gaps.

agents.duty: Ensure terms and names are used consistently throughout document
agents.docstring:
Check term and name consistency throughout document.

Single duty: Ensure terms and names used consistently.
Method: Dictionary tracking and matching (deterministic).
Output: Inconsistencies found with suggested corrections.

agents.duty: Apply redaction rules to protect sensitive information
agents.docstring:
Apply redaction rules to protect sensitive information.

Single duty: Redact PII and sealed information per rules.
Method: Regex-based pattern matching and replacement (deterministic).
Output: Redacted text with redaction log.

agents.duty: Verify document format and structure compliance
agents.docstring:
Verify document format compliance.

Single duty: Check formatting and structure requirements.
Method: Rule-based validation (deterministic).
Output: Compliance checklist with pass/fail status.

agents.duty: Ensure terms and names are used consistently throughout document
agents.docstring:
Check term and name consistency throughout document.

Single duty: Ensure terms and names used consistently.
Method: Dictionary tracking and matching (deterministic).
Output: Inconsistencies found with suggested corrections.

agents.duty: Apply redaction rules to protect sensitive information
agents.docstring:
Apply redaction rules to protect sensitive information.

Single duty: Redact PII and sealed information per rules.
Method: Regex-based pattern matching and replacement (deterministic).
Output: Redacted text with redaction log.

agents.duty: Verify document format and structure compliance
agents.docstring:
Verify document format compliance.

Single duty: Check formatting and structure requirements.
Method: Rule-based validation (deterministic).
Output: Compliance checklist with pass/fail status.

agents.duty: Perform expert-level strategic coherence and citation review
agents.docstring:
Expert-level final QA review.

Single duty: Strategic coherence and citation verification.
Method: LLM analysis with GPT-4o (premium tier for complex cases).
Output: Expert assessment with actionable feedback.
